blogPost.excerpt:
Sweet. Mischievous. Savage. ğŸ”¥ Mini-Pufts are out of the bag, don't miss #Ghostbusters: Afterlife only in theaters this fall.

Subscribe for more exclusive content: https://bit.ly/GhostbustersSubscribe 

Follow Ghostbusters on Social:
https://www.ghostbusters.com/?hs308=youtube
https://www.facebook.com/ghostbusters
https://www.twitter.com/ghostbusters
https://www.instagram.com/ghostbusters

From director Jason Reitman and producer Ivan Reitman, comes the next chapter in the original Ghostbusters universe. In Ghostbusters: Afterlife, when a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind. The film is written by Jason Reitman & Gil Kenan.

#Sony #Ghostbusters #GhostbustersAfterlife #CarrieCoon #FinnWolfhard #MckennaGrace #PaulRudd #JasonReitman #MiniPuft #MiniPufts

previous.excerpt:
No legacy lives forever.

The first generation of superheroes have kept the world safe for nearly a century. Now their children must continue their legendary ideals. From the mind of Mark Millar, Jupiterâ€™s Legacy is streaming only on Netflix May 7th, 2021.

Watch Jupiterâ€™s Legacy, only on Netflix: https://www.netflix.com/JupitersLegacy 

SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/29qBUt7

About Netflix:
Netflix is the world's leading streaming entertainment service with 204 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, documentaries and feature films across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can watch as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, on any internet-connected screen. Members can play, pause and resume watching, all without commercials or commitments.

Jupiterâ€™s Legacy | Official Trailer | Netflix
https://youtube.com/Netflix

They're the first generation of superheroes. But as they pass the torch to their children, tensions are rising â€” and the old rules no longer apply.

next.excerpt:
This May, the Devil Gets Her Due. See #Cruella in theaters and on #DisneyPlus with Premier Access May 28. Additional fee required.

Academy AwardÂ® winner Emma Stone (â€œLa La Landâ€) stars in Disneyâ€™s â€œCruella,â€ an all-new live-action feature film about the rebellious early days of one of cinemas most notorious â€“ and notoriously fashionable â€“ villains, the legendary Cruella de Vil. â€œCruella,â€ which is set in 1970s London amidst the punk rock revolution, follows a young grifter named Estella, a clever and creative girl determined to make a name for herself with her designs. She befriends a pair of young thieves who appreciate her appetite for mischief, and together they are able to build a life for themselves on the London streets. One day, Estellaâ€™s flair for fashion catches the eye of the Baroness von Hellman, a fashion legend who is devastatingly chic and terrifyingly haute, played by two-time OscarÂ® winner Emma Thompson (â€œHowards End,â€ â€œSense & Sensibilityâ€). But their relationship sets in motion a course of events and revelations that will cause Estella to embrace her wicked side and become the raucous, fashionable and revenge-bent Cruella. 
 
Disneyâ€™s â€œCruellaâ€ is directed by Craig Gillespie (â€œI Tonyaâ€) from a screenplay by Dana Fox and Tony McNamara, story by Aline Brosh McKenna and Kelly Marcel & Steve Zissis. It was produced by Andrew Gunn (â€œFreaky Fridayâ€), Marc Platt (â€œMary Poppins Returnsâ€) and Kristin Burr (â€œChristopher Robinâ€), with Emma Stone, Michelle Wright, Jared LeBoff and Glenn Close serving as executive producers. Two-time OscarÂ®- winning costume designer Jenny Beavan (â€œMad Max: Fury Road,â€ â€œA Room with a Viewâ€) creates the dazzling and imaginative costumes, which take on a life of their own.

For more information on â€œCruella,â€ follow us on:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DisneyCruellaDeVil 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/cruella  
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/disneycruella 
YouTube: https://youtube.com/disneymovietrailersâ€‹
Hashtag: #Cruella
